org.forum.api.services

Class MessageServiceJPAImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forum.api.services.MessageServiceJPAImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageService

    @Service(value="jpa")
public class MessageServiceJPAImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageService
    Uses JPA implementation for persistence.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message createMessage(Message message)
      Service creates message entry in database with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
      void deleteMessageById(java.lang.Long id)
      Service deletes message entry in database based on specified id.
      MessageBody getMessageBodyById(java.lang.Long id)
      Service returns MessageBody data model representing body of message based on specified id from database.
      java.util.List<MessageHeader> getMessageHeaderList()
      Service returns list of MessageHeader data models representing message header with corresponding id.
      Message updateMessageById(java.lang.Long id, Message message)
      Service updates message entry in database based on specified id with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
